name: babel-plugin-__coverage__
description: Babel 6.x plugin to add instrument code with Istanbul-compatible `__coverage__` variable.

scripts.mocha: env NODE_ENV=test BABEL_PLUGIN__COVERAGE__TEST=1 nyc -r lcov -r text mocha
scripts.prepublish: npm run clean && npm run build
scripts.test: npm run clean && npm run build && env BABEL_DISABLE_CACHE=1 ./node_modules/.bin/babel src --plugins $(pwd)/lib/index -d lib-cov && npm run mocha

author: Thai Pangsakulyanont <org.yi.dttvb@gmail.com> (http://dt.in.th/)
